about_the_game:
Duskmire: An Enchanting 2D Action Rogue-lite Platformer

Dive into the mesmerizing world of Duskmire, where every step unveils new wonders and every spell casts a unique enchantment upon your journey. This atmospheric 2D action rogue-lite platformer invites you on a magical journey through dark, snowstorm-swept mountains and enchanted forests, where breathtaking atmospheres await at every turn.



In Duskmire, the thrill of discovery and the art of mastering spell combinations define your gameplay experience. With a myriad of magical abilities at your disposal, craft and wield spells to tailor your strategy and conquer the dark and mysterious realms that await. Whether you crave fast-paced action or delight in intricate spell-crafting, Duskmire promises an exhilarating journey.

SPELLS / COMBINATIONS



Discover countless new gameplay experiences by exploring the special combinations of various elements, each creating unique synergies with one another. Experiment with different combinations to uncover new strategies and enhance your mastery of the elements. In Duskmire, the ability to mix and match elements to create powerful synergies opens up a wealth of gameplay possibilities, ensuring each adventure is fresh and filled with discovery.

CHALLENGE



Face off against powerful enemies and embrace the challenge of returning even stronger with every defeat in Duskmire!

name: Duskmire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A thrilling atmospheric 2D action rogue-lite platformer filled with countless spells and magical combinations. Craft your strategy by mixing powerful spells. Each playthrough offers unique and breathtaking atmospheres where you can face challenging experiences.
